column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////We had a 7:45 reservation on a Tuesday.  We were there on time
column2: but we weren't seated until 8:15.   Service was slow the entire night and the waiter had a pretty serious attitude.  Food was decent.  The sides were the highlight of the meal
column3: but didn't make up for the shortcomings elsewhere.  I'm in no rush to get back to Bavette's and would much rather go to Maude's.
